posts.text:
Kemur nýuppsett  með illa fengnu win 10 og office pakka.
Computer:      LENOVO 4518W8F
CPU:           Intel Core i5-2400 (Sandy Bridge-DT, D2)
               3100 MHz (31.00x100.0) @ 1597 MHz (16.00x99.8)
Motherboard:   LENOVO 
Chipset:       Intel Q67 (Cougar Point) [B3]
Memory:        8192 MBytes @ 665 MHz, 9.0-9-9-24
               - 2048 MB PC10600 DDR3 SDRAM - SK Hynix HMT325U6BFR8C-H9
               - 2048 MB PC10600 DDR3 SDRAM - SK Hynix HMT325U6BFR8C-H9
               - 2048 MB PC10600 DDR3 SDRAM - SK Hynix HMT125U6TFR8C-H9
               - 2048 MB PC10600 DDR3 SDRAM - SK Hynix HMT125U6TFR8C-H9
Graphics:      Intel Sandy Bridge-DT GT1 - Integrated Graphics Controller [D2/J1/Q0] [Lenovo]
               Intel HD Graphics 2000, 2172 MB 
Drive:         WDC WD5000AADS-00S9B0, 488.4 GB, Serial ATA 3Gb/s
Sound:         Intel Cougar Point PCH - High Definition Audio Controller [B3]
Network:       Intel 82579LM (Lewisville) Gigabit Ethernet Controller
OS:            Microsoft Windows 10  Build 10586
Verð = Tilboð

Dónaboð... 15kall
Sent from my Nexus 5X using Tapatalk
það er full dónalegt en ég myndi sætta mig við 20 fyrst það er nú komið góðæri aftur

Hitti þig rúmlega á miðri leið.  18kall
Sent from my Nexus 5X using Tapatalk
